discord.cmd.nick.no-permission: You do not have permission to change my name.
discord.cmd.avatar.no-permission: You do not have permission to change my avatar.
discord.cmd.prefix.no-permission: You do not have permission to change the command prefix.
discord.cmd.locale.no-permission: You do not have permission to change my language.
discord.cmd.locale.bad-file: That's an inappropriate locale name. It should be something like: enUS
discord.cmd.locale.no-file: I don't know that language, use
discord.cmd.locale.success: Language updated. All custom messages overwritten.
discord.cmd.local.no-permission: You do not have permission to change what I say.
discord.cmd.local.no-id: That message ID does not exist. See
tumblr.cmd.follow.no-permission: You do not have permission to do that.
tumblr.cmd.unfollow.no-permission: You do not have permission to do that.
tumblr.cmd.unfollow.tags.also-blog: I'm not following anything else on the blog, so I'm unfollowing the blog.
tumblr.cmd.unfollow.tags.not-found: I'm not following that tag set. Try
tumblr.cmd.list.not-found: I'm not following a blog by the name of {blog}
tumblr.cmd.list.tagset1: I am following {tags} from that blog.
tumblr.cmd.list.tagsets: I am following posts of these tag sets from {blog}:
tumblr.cmd.list.no-blogs: I'm not following any blogs for this channel.
tumblr.update.missed: I may have missed some posts from
twitter.cmd.follow.no-permission: You do not have permission to do that.
twitter.cmd.unfollow.no-permission: You do not have permission to do that.
twitter.cmd.unfollow.empty: There are no more twitter searches on this channel.
twitter.cmd.unfollow.none: No twitter searches active on this channel.
twitter.cmd.list.header: Twitter searches active on this channel:
twitter.cmd.list.none: No twitter searches active on this channel.
